__e: You're fairground workers in shiny suits, selling a product as worthless as you are.
Now... put on your suits. Or we'll put them on for you.
No, you gotta see the suits!
And we'll have your other suits and things no later than next week.
Problem is, anything over $25 I have to report, so maybe give my wife a call and give her the suits, and then if they don't fit her, maybe she'll give them to me.
Pick me up some new suits and a new watch.
